cancersimdata 0.1.0
  • Reference

Simulated data on overall survival from breast cancer with radiation therapy

bc_rt_data.Rd

These data are simulated in the context of the use of post-mastectomy radiation therapy in women with pathologic stage T1-2N1M0 breast cancer. Data on various patient and disease characteristics are available.

Usage

bc_rt_data

Format

bc_rt_data

A data frame with 3,000 rows and 13 columns:

time

Overall survival time in years

event

Death indicator, 1 = dead, 0 = censored

rt

PMRT indicator, 1 = yes, 0 = no

age_dx_yrs

Age at diagnosis in years

tumor_size_cm

Tumor size in cm

grade

Tumor grade, I, II, or III

n_ln_pos_3_vs_1or2

Number of positive lymph nodes, 1 = 3, 0 = 1 or 2

nodal_ratio

Ratio of number of positive lymph nodes to number of sampled lymph nodes

lvi

Lymphovascular invasion, 1 = yes, 0 = no

er_or_pr_pos

ER/PR status, 1 = ER+ or PR+, 0 = ER- and PR-

her2_pos

Her2 status, 1 = positive, 0 = negative

quadrant_inner_vs_other

Tumor location, 1 = inner quadrant, 0 = other quadrant (centeral, outer, multiple)

optimal_systemic_therapy

Receipt of optimal systemic therapy, 1 = yes (endocrine therapy if ER+ or PR+, trastuzumab if Her2+, and CHT if ER- and PR-), 0 = no
